website_summaries.verdict: An affordable water table with captivating features. An excellent option for budget-conscious buyers.
pros: This little water table is packed with fun features
Kids can arrange maze pieces, scoop and pour water, and play with the included accessories
A delightful water table at an unbeatable price
cons: Occasional complaints about the table's design and sturdiness

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect! The perfect height
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! The perfect height, I have small/premie babies so I was worried it would be too tall and they wouldn't be able to reach the high part to put water in it. Holds a lot of water, doesn't leak and it can even hold my son haha.
customer_reviews.author: M&M Hopfner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun table! I’ve been wanting to buy this for a while but it was too expensive for me and my morals haha. It went on sale though, I have it in my house for my toddler and I put soapy water or colored water or reg water, then I am able to dump out the water and on different days I do just dry rice or corn kernels or dried beans. It’s really fun for him and I’m sure I can put a lot more different things in there for him to play with. I would like to say that I do have a water proof mattress sheet that I purchased and put under this.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to put together and the neighborhood kids cannot get enough of it! I also really like that it's lightweight so we can store it in the garage without much hassle. Just set it up in the grass, pull the plug when you're done, and carry it to it's storage spot in the garage. Easy peasy. Also possibly worth noting, step 2 offers replacement accessory kits for this and other water tables. Our daughter loved the bucket this came with which somehow got misplaced. I placed an order with step 2 for a replacement kit for another water table that had the bucket and a few new toys too.
customer_reviews.author: laura harmon

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for busy toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes a $40 water table is a necessity! Keeping my busy 2 year old (the youngest of 6) entertained is a big deal. Totally worth it! Took less than ten minutes for this stay at home mom to put it together (with the help of said 2 year old), only 1 screw driver needed, everything else snaps together, awesome!)
customer_reviews.author: Susie D

customer_reviews.title: Great table some flaws... hours of enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: First let me say my 19 month old loves it! It gives her hours of enjoyment. It was probably the easiest thing I've ever put together too (with the exception of the water toy that has the two purple pieces). The screws were hiding with the rubber duck in case anyone else is looking for them. It would be nice if the water toys snapped into place. But she enjoys moving them around. The plastic tub seems a little flimsier than the other step 2 products I've had in the past. The drain plug is a solid plus though and overall it's a decent table for the price. Just a few design flaws that bother me more than the kid.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Harper

customer_reviews.title: Best water table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water table for my two grandchildren ages 2 & 4. They love this table and enjoy the toys that come with it. It was very easy to assemble and I being the grandma put it together myself in no time! Some of the water tables require tools and involved assembly but this one was a breeze and an excellent choice. Very happy with this water table!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Egelston

customer_reviews.title: Content
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something our kids could play with in the yard that we could use during summer and winter time and this is a great buy for the price. My only complaint is that the middle part where the rain shower is standing is wobbly and already leaning. However it’s getting five stars because there was a part missing from the package we contacted them and they sent out a replacement and it arrived in less than a week. So for the price we’re happy.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzfire

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to have something to do during quarantine and he LOVES it! Very easy to assemble and super cute! There’s a plug to easily let the water out when your done playing. It’s not heavy so you could carry it outside or wherever you want it. Everything with this is very durable and not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: the kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter enjoys this, at 1.5yo. Didn't have any issues with assembly, don't really care that the water doesn't consistently spin the gears.... It drains quickly, even quicker if you just dump the water over the side. We keep it stored in the shed, so no mold or gunk (yet). The kiddo is safely entertained, which gives us a chance to sit back and watch her play.
customer_reviews.author: yekkersrow

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids 1-4
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and has been a hit ever since with all the young kids to play with during the warmer months. I have a different water table for my son and I really wish I had this one for him. It's simple and easy to put together and has just enough "extras" for the kids to play with without it getting too complicated or hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Endless water fun for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never fully understand why toddlers love playing with water so much, but it’s a fact...they do! My son played with a similar water station at a BBQ last summer and he, along with 10 other toddlers, all flocked to it the whole day! We ordered this one that night and he played with it the entire summer. He loves it so much we even brought it inside this spring on some bad weather days, because he wanted to me play with it and couldn’t wait for it to get warmer out. For parents in need of something to keep their 2-3 year-old’s attention for hours...this is your product!
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and clean
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to play in water and isn't very interested in a baby pool, so this satisfies her. It was easy to assemble and will be easy to disassemble and store. I bought one with just a few features because I wanted to make sure I could clean it easily and that has worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this play table. We haven't done water play yet since it hasn't been hot enough, but I put dried beans for a sensory table. It is self assemble, but instructions were easy to read and follow. The purple windmill piece in the middle is stiff and doesn't spin which I didn't like because it looks as if it should. I also noticed the top slightly tilted to the side - not sure if it is a little top heavy or why its like that. It serves its purpose, maybe a little pricey but I am happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute water table
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a bit of a tough time putting this together but once we did the boys loved it! They had a lot of fun playing with the water table however it did take a while to clean when we put it away for the winter. Get out a lot of Clorox wipes :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gina A. Marandino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves this! This was recommended to me and I’m so happy I put CHL asked it! The spinning things take a few times to really get broken in so they spin better but this is one of my daughters favorite toys so far!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our toddler, and it’s a great height for play. She can’t reach the top portion well yet, but she’s happy for us to do it for her. It feels sturdy and comes with accessories which I appreciate. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F.

customer_reviews.title: Basic water table
customer_reviews.text: I looked through a lot of water tables before deciding on this one. I thought that the interactive spinners and whatnot would be more active but they're hard to use as intended. My 3 and 1 year olds like it- I'm glad there aren't a ton of extra tubes and pieces to keep track of. Pieces were all included and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, quality material. Choose a different version.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome but I would get a basic table if I did it again. The upper attachment isn't level, regardless of if the ground is level. So water doesn't flow evenly and in turn 2 of the three drop catches dont work at any given time. The entire upper level is useless so a different model would be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Smartnthrifty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old and four year old and they both love this. It’s provides hours of entertainment and there is a lot of accessories on it unlike some of the other water tables. The only thing is the stop part is kind of wobbly and I’m nervous it’s going to break off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren are having a great time playing with this
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren are having a great time playing with this! The only negative I have is that the tower part isn't quite as sturdy as I would like (it wobbles a bit) and the spinning toys on the side of the tower don't spin when the water rains down on them. We will probably try making the holes a little bigger so the water falls faster and maybe that will fix that problem.
customer_reviews.author: C Groom

customer_reviews.title: Love! This combines some of the better features of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! This combines some of the better features of the water tower with their more traditional size water table. Kiddos will have so much fun playing with this! Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vinjari1990

customer_reviews.title: Packaging mess, nice table
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Great size for two kids to play together without fighting. Box looks like a disaster when you get it - so not a good gift. But we got all the pieces and nothing seems damaged.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Resilient and great height for 3 years or older
customer_reviews.text: The tower is resilient. Immediately after assembly our grandson pulled on the top tower and it did not break. Easy to pour water in holes and have decals spin. New so we did not clean yet. Mold has grown in other towers they have had. Hoping this is easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sound thoughts

customer_reviews.title: This was quick and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was quick and easy to put together. (you do need a screw driver for 3 screws) from out of box to playing was about 10 minutes and we've had so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: KinMS

customer_reviews.title: Great product one big problem
customer_reviews.text: The screws were missing for the final assembly. If the product does not come with them, it would be shoking. I looked for the screws for about an hour all over, it did not come in the box. I had to find my own.
customer_reviews.author: SWAT

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but remember, it's lightweight plastic.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. The only reason for 1 less star is that it's plastic and light weight, so if the toddler is leaning against it or trying to hold onto it while it's empty, it'll get pushed and it's definitely not sturdy enough to be a support for toddlers to lean on it.
customer_reviews.author: Caerul

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old nephew and he loves it! He wants to play with it everyday. Easy to assemble. You will need a screwdriver. My nephew loved it even before we put water in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: 1st birthday awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandsons 1st birthday. He loved it and got wet immediately. All the kids at his party played with it and they were age 1-9 yrs. It is simple design, easy to assemble and comes with a few toys. Main tray is just the right height for 1 year old and he can reach top tray but not tall enough to pour water in yet. Perfect gift for a Gramma win!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Vilanova

customer_reviews.title: Great water table, precisely what I'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: We love this water table. It's our second one, and I like it better than pur old one. Yes, it's a little flimsyish, but it is a plastic water table. The shower feature is a big hit, as is the plastic duck finger. If you have a kid who likes to pull things apart, superglue the parts on and you're golden.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Price was great. Tower is a little less sturdy. Doesn’t fully drain, even if you tip it around. Fair size and hours of free play make it worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diantha

customer_reviews.title: Birthday bummer
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I’m noticing I’m not the only one who received item with missing pieces. My sons 2nd birthday is this weekend and I had high hopes of setting this up for him to enjoy. We are very bummed! The piece that is missing is a key piece that holds the top together. Pointless now and we will have to return. Kinda thinking I was better of just going to our local Walmart or Target and spent a little more money ... at least I know the pieces would all be there. One sad mama :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sensory table ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday and she loves it! I love that it comes with toys and accessories attached giving her more to play with. It's easy to drain and disinfect when she is finished! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: They don't make things like they used to
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is perfect for the littles to splash in the water, the attached toys don't stay in place well and the top isn't sturdy. It keeps the grandkids busy for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Tztwt3

customer_reviews.title: not a sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: The top part where the water fall happens is flimsy and wants to come off if lightly pulled on (which little ones tend to do). Also one of the water wheels doesn't spin. All of the water wheels are not held in tightly and easy for kiddos to pull out. I doubt this will last the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Holman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kids birthday, age 4 and 1. Both were entertained with it and had a lot of fun. Whatever makes my kids happy, definitely gets a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: A trustworthy critic

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Our one year old grandson likes this alot! Fun for the summer months. Is the right height for him to hold on to. I fill it with warm water for him to play. It has a drain plug on the bottom also. I add all sorts of different toys for him to play with.
customer_reviews.author: TexasPerson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My toddler never wants to stop playing with it!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this!! Great purchase. Hope it lasts as she sometimes pulls on the middle part. Great table tho. Will get a lot of use this summer. Def reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute Water Table
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a two-year-old. She loved it as well as her older sister and brothers. Nice to have to play with in the driveway, or on a deck.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi of 6

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew and he loves it. He likes the water falling from the top! I think the toys on the center part could be a little further out so when the water does fall it could land or spin the wheels and other toys. It was easy to put together also. Plug was fine and the toys that come with are perfect for this! Will definitely purchase again for my son when he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: DeZaRaY

customer_reviews.title: Our niece loves this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our niece for her 2nd birthday and she absolutely loves it. It was easy to put together and it does not mildew easily. Great value and great item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it. The upper part is kinda meh. But that's just because I don't want to manually put water there for hours. Haven't decided if my 2yo's ablility to drag it around when empty is a good thing or not.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, good price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at our BBQ from kids aged 1-6 years. It took about 10 minutes to assemble. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo is loving it! I think the price wasn’t bad for what you get. My kid is obsessed with playing in water so we got her this and I highly recommend if you have a kid who loves to play in the water to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for younger children! My daughter is almost 4 and tall. It's a little flimsy and definitely could be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: NonnaBeth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!! Looks like a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased a new table every year for 4 years. This one looks really fun!!! Our granddaughter is 4 1/2 perfect size for her!
customer_reviews.author: shane mclelland

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Supet easy to assemble, it's huge fit for my 18 month old and 4 years old!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: magard

customer_reviews.title: Super fun water play
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and holds water no leaking but the toys come off way to easy and plastic feels very thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: We loved it
customer_reviews.text: Good size table, my 20 month old loved it. The accessories are perfect for him, he loves the interchangeable pieces. He spends hrs removing them and re attaching them. He could spend hrs with or with out water. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor toy for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 1 year old grandson and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: tec

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and keeps my granddaughter busy as she loves to play with water.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandsons 1st birthday. Loves it! Sits outside so he can splash and get wet all he wants. Keeps him content.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old daughter loves this water table. It was also super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with it overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with it overall. My kid really enjoys it. I have one gripe though, the little water toy attachments don't actually spin or move when the water goes over them. The water either barely touches it or they are not loose enough to spin.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the summer weather!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and definitely a good way to entertain the kids for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy_kat

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson's birthday. It was featured at his party and was a super hit with all the kids. He doesn't seem to ever tire of it, which is home run for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids cool
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this water table. It was easy to put together and big enough for my 2 and 6 year olds to play with and enjoy. The top is a little flimsy but well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Cute and great value, but not all the little pieces function.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer! Compact and less messy!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Easy to assemble with clear instructions. 2. Safe and a good height for our 2 year old. 3. Structures and toys to keep our child occupied in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Anup

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE this. However
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. However, the little pieces that are supposed to move when water is dumped through the top don’t really work as they should. My kids are also quite young so they usually end up pulling those pieces out anywhere because there is no way to secure them. They just slide in. My kids are 1 & 2 so they don’t really care about the mechanic pieces. They just love splashing around in it and find other ways to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra

customer_reviews.title: Great prot
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect buy for my toddlers!! They LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Benton

customer_reviews.title: 1yo twins LOVE their water table!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our new water table! My boys are 1, and can't get enough of splashing around in this. They also think the duck launcher is hilarious, and the showers are so fun to watch/play in. Easy to assemble. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: emmapeachh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer outdoor toy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old grandsons birthday. He loves it! Colorful and lots of ways to play
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Water Tables are great
customer_reviews.text: Toddler love her water table we keep it outside and it does fine in the weather! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Ferebee

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my one year old grandson and he loves it. So does his five year old sister! Perfect for backyard summer fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The baby loves this table. Cant take her away from it
customer_reviews.author: Ron Homolka

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Great table for toddlers, although my daughter likes it when the water trickles down from the top level, but it’s hard to keep the hose there without continually holding it. Other than that it’s wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fun summer toy
customer_reviews.text: Using it already..... Gonna be a good toy for the deck..
customer_reviews.author: Linda LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this water table. Our LO has a blast with it. I wish the legs were a tad heavier. If it doesn’t have water in it, it can easily be pulled over. Otherwise very happy with the table!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela D'Angio

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Easy to put together and my 15 month old loves that the water “rains” down from above when we pour water on the top portion. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Classic

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy enough for 2.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: not very sturdy when my child plays with it. She's pretty gentle with toys to. She wants to see where the water at the top is coming from, when she slightly pulls on it out looks like the whole base is going to snap off
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great water fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a birthday gift, and the 7 year old, the five year old, the 3 year old and the two year old all had a great time playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Harris

customer_reviews.title: My son enjoys it, but wish I got one with more stuff on it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toy. I wish I picked one that had more for my son to do with it. But that's not the seller or manufacturer's fault. It works as advertised and my son likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The table is fine. The tower piece seems to be permanently tilted regardless of the ground it sits on. It is essentially just a big bucket of water on legs, which I guess is it's purpose. For a 1 year old it is okay. She loses her interest in it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Children busy
customer_reviews.text: My older grandkids seemed to out grow this but the younger ones still enjoy it. They spend hours playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Personal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Just delivered today. Happy to see it has a drain plug for easy access emptying dirty water! My children 8 months to 6 years old are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginamarie Leto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sons (4 and 1 year) LOVE this. Hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Missing a couple screws but not too hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: K Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Toddler LOVES LOVES LOVES this. Easy to clean. My only complaint would be that the tower leans a bit and isn't sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Handa

customer_reviews.title: The kid loves it and it was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The kid loves it and it was very easy to put together. Only thing is the tower leans. Not a big​ deal but that kinda stuff bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Leans a bit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and durable. My nephew loves it! The only small downside would be that the center piece isn’t balanced well so it leans over. Other than that, it came complete, the colors are vibrant and the water drains just as well as it holds it.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Splash tower
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. It is a little flimsy. Not as sturdy as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun! My kids love it! The only thing is that it seems unsturdy. But it was pretty cheap so I’m not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This water tabke is very flimsy and cheap. The pieces do not stay in place and it is not very engaging in the design. The catapult/sling shot comes out of the hole and the wheels do not even touch eachother to spin when the water is dropped down. Very disappointed with this expensive table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble cute little water table , little guy loved it . i clean it after every use otherwise there is build up. Came as described and got here fast .
customer_reviews.author: todd theriault

customer_reviews.title: Fun water table
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. Seems a little un-sturdy and feels like it may fall over. A few parts dont "snap" on so they were taken off by my toddler and promptly lost but over all we have loved this water table
customer_reviews.author: ashlee bambrough

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our son and it was so easy to put together and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Water safety
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summer water toy! As soon as it was assembled & filled with water it was like a magnet for the little neighborhood kids. Best part not dangerous like a wadding pool ! Easy to drain & put away !
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great water activity. My 6 & 2 year old loves to play outside so this was a plus
customer_reviews.author: Melody Espada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for my 2 year old and his friends. The kids run to the table and
customer_reviews.author: acromie

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Cool little thing. Don't let your kid try to sit on it or in it. Legs are weak.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Marble

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 4 yrs old and loves this thing. With strict stay at home orders having the water play provides a few hours fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old lovessss her water table!! She plays with it ALL the time! Easy to put together too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie and fam

customer_reviews.title: Great for waterplay
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. My granddaughter -age 2- loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves it. He got it for his first birthday. It will work well for when he is taller so he can reach the upper water thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it. She is a total water ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She is a total water baby. I cant wait to get some water beads for it
customer_reviews.author: ama

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed with this water table. Has a couple of toys connected and drain at the bottom.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was so nice her parents had already bought her the same one so I had to return it, which returning it was very easy. I will definitely look into another Step 2 product to replace this for Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, in less than 5 minutes. Only a screwdriver needed. Seems sturdy and a good quality.

customer_reviews.title: My babies loved it! It's so big can't wait for the ...
customer_reviews.text: My babies loved it! It's so big can't wait for the summer to add the water.. For now they just add toys, cars and other things they keep very busy.

product_meta.title: Step2 Summer Showers Splash Tower Water Table | Kids Water Play Table with 8-Pc Accessory Set
product_meta.description: Full of fun outdoor water play, the Step2 Summer Showers Splash Tower Water Table is a great way for kids to socialize with friends and to challenge their fine and gross motor skills. Scoop up water from the basin and pour into the water tower tray to create a showering splash below! Toddlers will enhance their gross motor skills through standing water activity play, and challenge their fine motor skills using the accessories as they play the day away. This water table for toddlers features water-activated put-and-place maze pieces that can be rearranged to create exciting combinations of splish-splash fun and teach cause and effect. From the side flippers to water tower and tray, this water activity center for kids has tons of ways to play for multiple little ones to engage and have fun together. Made in the USA of US and imported parts.
feature_bullets: Make a splash with the Step2 Summer Showers Splash Tower Water Table!
Large, open water activity table design allows toddlers to practice social skills.
Spacious outdoor water table for toddlers features 360-degree water play fun!
Non-leak drain plug keeps water in during playtime and allows for easy clean-up when playtime fun is done.
In the box: Water table base with water tower and 8-piece accessory set.
Note from Step2: All Step2 water tables come with pictured accessories for no added charge.
